slides.title: Learning Objectives
content: By the end of this tutorial, you will be able to:
1. Identify key prompt components for effective AI communication.
2. Construct clear and specific prompts for various AI tools.
3. Apply iterative techniques to refine AI responses.
4. Utilize advanced strategies like role-playing and output formatting.
narration: At the end of this spoken tutorial, you will be able to:
First, identify key prompt components.
These help you talk to AI effectively.
Second, construct clear and specific prompts.
These work for many AI tools.
Third, apply iterative techniques.

slides.title: Communicating with AI: A New Skill
content: AI is a powerful assistant.
Like talking to a human, good input brings good output.
Quality prompts save time and boost capabilities.
Mastering prompts unlocks AI's full potential.
narration: Imagine AI as a very smart assistant.
You need to tell it exactly what to do.
Just like talking to a human assistant.
Good input always gives you good output.
Clear prompts save you time and effort.
slides.image_prompt: An abstract depiction of a person having a clear dialogue with a robot or AI interface, represented by speech bubbles and clear data flow, vibrant and intelligent colors

slides.title: Clarity and Specificity: The Basics
content: Clarity is King: Avoid vague requests.
AI needs precise details.
Think like a detective, provide all facts.
Specificity Sells: Be exact in your request.
Define length, tone, and audience.
Example: 'Tell me about electric cars' vs. 'Write 75 words on benefits of electric cars for urban commuters, positive tone'.
narration: First, **clarity is king**.
Do not give vague requests to AI.
AI cannot read your mind.
It needs precise details from you.
Think like a detective.
Give all necessary facts upfront.
Second, **specificity sells**.
slides.image_prompt: A magnifying glass focusing on two distinct prompts: one vague and one highly specific, showing the contrast, with clear text overlays and checkmarks for the specific one, minimalist design

slides.title: Context and Role-Playing: Deeper Engagement
content: Provide Context: Give background information.
Helps AI understand the 'why'.
Share relevant details or data.
Role-Playing: Assign a persona to AI.
Influences style, vocabulary, perspective.
Example: 'Act as a marketing expert. Summarize this article (link) for our Q3 social media strategy.'
narration: Now, let us add depth to our prompts.
First, **provide context** to the AI.
Give it background information.
This helps AI understand 'why' you are asking.
Share relevant details or data points.
Second, try **role-playing**.
Tell the AI to pretend it is someone.
slides.image_prompt: A split image: one side showing a user feeding background information into an AI symbol (context), the other side showing an AI symbol wearing different hats (e.g., a chef hat, a business hat) representing role-playing, interconnected thought bubbles

slides.title: Format and Constraints: Shaping Output
content: Define Format: Tell AI how to present output.
Specify lists, paragraphs, tables, code.
Set Constraints: Dictate what to include or exclude.
Limit word count, restrict topics, define tone.
Example: 'List 5 party themes for adults, budget-friendly, diverse group' versus 'Generate a table with Theme, Idea, Decor; 5 distinct themes for young professionals; exclude costumes'.
narration: Next, we shape the AI's output.
First, **define the format**.
Tell the AI how you want the answer to look.
Specify if you need lists, paragraphs, or a table.
Second, **set constraints**.
Tell the AI what to include or exclude.
slides.image_prompt: A user pointing to various output formats on a screen (bullet points, table, paragraph) on one side, and on the other side, a fence or boundary symbol with specific 'allow' and 'disallow' tags, illustrating constraints, organized and structured visual

slides.title: Summary: Your Prompting Checklist
content: Always be Clear and Specific.
Provide Context and assign a Role.
Define Format and apply Constraints.
Remember, it is an Iterative Process.
narration: Let us quickly summarise what we learned.
Always remember to be **clear and specific**.
Provide **context** to the AI.
Also, assign a **role** for the AI to play.
Define the **format** you want for the output.
slides.image_prompt: A checklist icon with four main checkmarks, each representing a key prompting principle: Clarity & Specificity, Context & Role, Format & Constraints, Iteration, clean and simple design

slides.title: Assignment
content: Scenario:
You need a social media post for a new eco-friendly coffee cup launch.
Task:
Draft a prompt for an AI to generate this post.
Include clarity, specificity, context, role, format, and constraints.
narration: Here is a small assignment for you.
The scenario is: You need a social media post.
This post is for a new eco-friendly coffee cup launch.
Your task is to draft a prompt for an AI.
The AI will generate this social media post.
Make sure your prompt includes everything we learned.
